name: CPPartner
short_description: Lightweight IDE focused on rapid development and deployment of small- to medium-scale applications. Aims for simplicity rather than feature overload, and tries to enable all-around customization. Integrates with subversion and git, as well as other existing project management tools.
summary: Lightweight C++ IDE for Linux (built on Qt4.8)
